result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dallas Lamar Evans

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dallas Lamar Evans appeared by video.  Attorney Gary Raymond George Aty appeared by video for Dallas Lamar Evans.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel does not have an offer but has discovery.  Defense counsel requests adjourned status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 094772,
Payable Number: 1036568,
Receipt Number: 22RP039724,
Amount: $20.00
Pre-trial conference on November 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Due to Court being down 10/7/2022, the 10/7/2022 pretrial conference is rescheduled to 11/4/2022 at 1:30 p.m. by zoom defendant notified via notice of hearing.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Dallas Lamar Evans appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo appeared by video for Dallas Lamar Evans.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
